intro-8: Veloza is a technology innovation company that started in New York and focuses on the Asia-Pacific region. Its mission is to establish the world's most prestigious and authoritative tech innovation awards, aiming to create an "Oscar"-level brand in the industry. It positions itself as a leader in recognizing and promoting groundbreaking technological advancements.
